pages.text: Vault Dolls are crafted to let $(l)other players$() run Vaults $(l)for you$() while carrying it.$(br2)Upon crafting, they have a $(l)Loot Efficiency$() and $(l)Experience Efficiency$(), which determines the percentages of $(l)loot$() and $(l)Vault Experience$() they will retrieve.$(br2)The Vault Doll only functions when placed in the $(l)Head curio slot$().

pages.title: Vault Dolls
pages.text: Once out of a Vault, the Vault Doll can be $(l)released$() by the $(l)owner$().$(br2)They can $(l)place$() the Vault Doll on the ground, after which it needs to be $(l)unalived$() to retrieve its rewards.
